duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform general cost accounting and other related duties in the accounting department.
Prepare periodic (monthly) balance sheets, income statements, and profit and loss statements.
Maintain the general ledger in correspondence to daily operations.
Oversee Account Payables G.L. coding & verification of processed payments.
Match bank activity daily and generate accurate monthly bank reconciliations.
Reconcile vendor accounts in a timely manner.
Follow, replicate, and generate all monthly financial activity using intermediate/advanced knowledge of Excel.
Provide outside auditors with assistance; gather necessary account information and documents to perform annual audit.
Properly identify tax calculations in accordance with federal, state, and local government agencies.
Coordinate with software vendor to maintain accounting software system; recommend updates to enhance the accounting software.
Perform other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline required (Master's preferred)
Odoo experience preferred, but not required
